text: "Hear Me Now" is a song recorded by Brazilian DJs Alok and Bruno Martini featured the Brazilian-American recording artist Zeeba. The song was released on 21 October 2016 via Spinnin' Records. ==Composition== Noiseprn described the genre of the song as 'Brazilian bass'. ==Music video== An official music video for the song was released on YouTube by Alok and Spinnin' Records, the latter having over 300 million views as of July 2019. ==Track listing== Digital download # "Hear Me Now" – 3:12 # "Hear Me Now" (Club Edit) – 5:34 ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016–18) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Brazil (Brasil Hot 100) | 54 |- ! scope="row"| Brazil (Billboard Brasil Pop Airplay) | 6 |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Mexico (Billboard) | 1 |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Russia Airplay (Tophit) | 2 |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Ukraine Airplay (Tophit) | 1 |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Position |- ! scope="row"| France (SNEP) | 139 |- ! scope="row"| Hungary (Rádiós Top 40) | 84 |- ! scope="row"| Italy (FIMI) | 37 |- ! scope="row"| Netherlands Dance (MegaCharts) | 32 |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 94 |- ! scope="row"| Switzerland (Schweizer Hitparade) | 78 |- ! scope="row"| US Hot Dance/Electronic Songs (Billboard) | 69 |} ==Certifications== ==References== Category:2016 singles Category:2016 songs Category:Alok (DJ) songs Category:Electronic songs Category:Spinnin' Records singles
